item.title: [718 matrix] Small error, need help/explanation
item.dc:creator: @ethanhello ethanhello
item.description:
@ethanhello wrote:

Hey guys, got a small error and I’m pretty new to this, learning how to code and such…

Can someone explain how to fix this and what it means so i know how to fx it in the future, would be grateful!

Compiler has started... Please wait while compiling... src\com\rs\game\player\content\Shop.java:101: error: method getBuyPrice in class Shop cannot be applied to given types; int price = getBuyPrice(item, dq); ^ required: Item found: Item,int reason: actual and formal argument lists differ in length 1 error Compiler has finished! Press any key to continue . . .

That is the error in my compiler

int dq = clickSlot >= mainStock.length ? 0 : defaultQuantity[clickSlot]; int price = getBuyPrice(item, dq); int amountCoins = player.getInventory().getItems().getNumberOf(money); int amountInPouch = player.money; int maxPouch = amountInPouch / price; int maxQuantity = amountCoins / price; int buyQ = item.getAmount() > quantity ? quantity : item.getAmount();

this is my shop.java, obviously the 2nd line that is wrong but i don’t see how!?

Thanks in advance for any help!
